name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sausage Man For PC: New Tab Theme

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sausage Man For PC/Window/Laptop is available in the chrome web store as a new tab theme, just install it and use.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sausage Man For PC/Window/Laptop, this is a new tab theme for chrome Browser, just install it and change the layout of chrome Browser.

Features:-

1. Time & date
2. Bookmark
3. Google Apps
4. All Type of Web Game.
5. Notes & To-Do List
6. Animation Effects, Etc...

How To Install:-

1. Just click on "Add To Chrome" Button
2. After downloading you new tab theme is Added in chrome.
3. Click on New Tab then wallpaper automatically Changes
4. Lets Enjoy.

Thanks :)
